Title: A million Iron Men are growing up
Designer: Nanchong region artistic creation group (南充地区美术创作组)
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: The assembled oil workers are attending a meeting to honor "Iron Man" Wang Jinxi (铁人王进喜). The text on the derrick reads "Study the advanced warrior of the working class Iron Man Wang Jinxi" (向工人阶级的先锋战士铁人王进喜学习). The song that is sung is "Socialism is good" (社会主义好).
